about_the_game:
You've been captured and enslaved by mysterious figures and tasked with retrieving a valuable resource from the depths of an ancient facility, but it may not be as abandoned as it looks... Will you accept your fate, or find a way to escape enslavement?

Abrasion is a first-person horror game set inside a brutal, skyless, megastructure. It's a difficult game that won't hold your hand, and takes around 90 minutes to complete. The world is filled with useful items, environmental storytelling, and many secrets, so exploration is heavily encouraged.

Features

  • A dynamic, stalking AI monster.

  • An interconnected world full of hidden passages and secret areas.

  • Diverse items and tools to help you progress.

  • Deep worldbuilding enhanced by intricately designed visuals and audio.

  • An unsettling story told through the game's environments.

content_descriptors.notes: It's a horror game set in an empty facility. There are corpses and unsettling monster.
